title: FACT CHECK: This man kicking tennis ball in this viral clip is not Diego Maradona - Times of India
subtitle: News News: A video in which an overweight man can be seen kicking a tennis ball is being shared on social media with the claim that he is Argentina's legendary f
author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
vclaim: A video in which an overweight man can be seen kicking a tennis ball is being shared on social media with the claim that he is Argentina 's legendary footballer Diego Maradona The video is being shared with similar claims across different social media platforms. Many social media users are expressing shock over the weight Maradona seems to have gained.Diego Maradona is not the man kicking the tennis ball in the video. The man in the video is actor Roly Serrano. This video is taken from the film 'Youth' released in 2015. In this film, Serrano played the character of Maradona.On searching 'Diego Maradona' on YouTube , we found a video uploaded four years ago on a channel named Guerrilla Gardener. This is the longer version of the video now going viral. The video's description says that it is a clip from the film Youth.Youth was an Italian comedy-drama film directed by Paolo Sorrentino. Roly Serrano played Diego Maradona in the film.We also found another scene from the film on YouTube featuring Serrano as Maradona.Times Fact Check has found that a scene from the Italian film Youth, which was released in 2015, is being shared with the false claim that it is Argentina's legendary footballer Diego Maradona in it. The man seen in the video is Roly Serrano, who was playing the role of Maradona in the film.
